triples.name: Artificial intelligence
triples.relevance: The paper addresses building knowledge bases and systems for AI applications, specifically multifunctional knowledge bases for artificial intelligence.

triples.name: Knowledge base
triples.relevance: The paper focuses on developing software and tools for building, maintaining, and accessing multifunctional knowledge bases.

triples.name: Machine learning
triples.relevance: The paper proposes a machine learning program for automatically integrating new information into existing knowledge.

triples.name: Knowledge engineering
triples.relevance: The paper addresses knowledge engineering requirements for identifying interactions between new and existing knowledge in multifunctional knowledge bases.

triples.name: Question answering
triples.relevance: The paper proposes a question answering system as the software for accessing portions of the knowledge base that coherently answer questions.

triples.name: Knowledge representation and reasoning
triples.relevance: The paper develops a language for representing knowledge, which is a fundamental technique in knowledge representation.

triples.name: Expert system
triples.relevance: The paper develops multifunctional knowledge bases to support numerous expert systems and reduce their brittleness.
